name: add

desc: Subtract one number from another number

name: multiply
desc: Multiply one number by another number

name: divide
desc: Divide one number by another number

desc: increment a number

name: decrement
desc: decrement a number

desc: Multiply one decimal number by another decimal number

name: decimalDivide
desc: Divide one decimal number by another decimal number

desc: Add two strings of input together.

name: concatenateVariable
desc: Add one string to the end of an exiting string.

desc: Calculate the length of the string

name: findFirstCharacter
desc: Target first character in the string

name: findNthCharacter
desc: Target nth character in the string

name: push
desc: push new element to end of array

name: pop
desc: remove last element of an array

name: shift
desc: remove first element of array

name: unshift
desc: add element in front of array

desc: Count cards and determine hold or bet

desc: generate a random whole number within a range
